name: Chicken Pomegranate Salad
description:
A simple, sweet and deliscoius salda of chicken,
    pomegranates, spinach, and spiced candied walnuts.  Served with a side of
    citrus vinaigrette.

name: Strawberry Pudding
description:
A sweet and tasty pudding filled with strawberries,
    blueberries and raspberries.

name: Ham and Goat Cheese Croissant
description:
A savory slice of ham topped with a wedge of goat cheese,
    all on a buttery, flaky croissant.
